meanings.definition: To outdo in generalship or strategy.
meanings.sent1: She always outgenerals her opponents in chess.
meanings.sent2: The general outgenerals the enemy by using clever tactics.
meanings.sent3: The young cadet outgenerals the older players in the strategy game.
meanings.sent4: His ability to outgenerals his rivals is like a master chess player.
meanings.sent5: The way she outgenerals her foes is truly impressive.

meanings.definition: To surpass in military skill or tactics.
meanings.sent1: The commander outgenerals the enemy forces in every battle.
meanings.sent2: The army outgenerals the opposition with their advanced weaponry.
meanings.sent3: The soldier outgenerals his comrades in the training exercises.
meanings.sent4: His strategic thinking outgenerals any other military leader.
meanings.sent5: The way they outgenerals their adversaries is remarkable.
